introduction: Famed movie Director Alex Storm has the ticket of a lifetime as he is able to FLUX into the movies he created. After a tragic accident he found himself in a nexus of Fiction, 20 worlds, 1 life. Killer clowns, Superheroes, fresh hungry Alien Snatchers, Gangsters, Nazis, Medieval knights, serial killers, rogue cops, Cowboys and MI5 Spies are all hot on his tail. Worst of all he cannot escape a faceless wraith known as the Hunter, this dark entity always finds him in every world, who is this Hunter? is it death itself? Storm's time is running out, . unknown to him, he is on his last reel and only one person can pull him out from the Nexus before he is lost forever.
